tweet.text: For this month’s #ArchivesHashtagParty, we’re highlighting our databases of Presidential and Secretarial travel through an #ArchivesPostcard series. Enjoy Pres. Roosevelt’s 1933 vacation to Canada’s Campobello Island, documented in: https://t.co/jjYObM1uU5 (1/2) https://t.co/bH9ghrClD3
